item.title: Leila add a quote by Patrick H.T. Doyle
item.description: "If Pavlov tested his cat he would have failed." -- Patrick H.T. Doyle

item.title: Leila add a quote by King Whitney Jr
item.description: "Change has a considerable psychological impact on the human mind. To the fearful it is threatening because it means that things may get worse. To the hopeful it is encouraging because things may get better. To the confident it is inspiring because the challenge exists to make things better. " -- King Whitney Jr

item.title: Leila add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I have lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.' You must do the thing you think you cannot do." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Leila add a quote by Calvin Coolidge
item.description: "If you don't say anything, you won't be called on to repeat it." -- Calvin Coolidge

item.title: Leila add a quote by Stephen R. Covey
item.description: "Most people do not listen with the intent to understand; they listen with the intent to reply." -- Stephen R. Covey
